  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/G3D/RegistryUtil.h
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/G3D/Image4unorm8.h
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/G3D/PixelTransferBuffer.h
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/G3D/Any.h
  )

add_library(g3dlib
  STATIC
    ${G3DLIB_SOURCES_FILES}
    ${G3DLIB_SOURCES_INCLUDES}
  )

target_include_directories(g3dlib
  PUBLIC
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  )

target_link_libraries(g3dlib
  PRIVATE
    typhoon-dependency-interface
  PUBLIC
    threads
    zlib
  )

set_target_properties(g3dlib
  PROPERTIES
    FOLDER
      "third_party"
  )
